1.name: Beetlejuice
1.description: The spirits of a deceased couple are harassed by an unbearable family that has moved into their home, and hire a malicious spirit to drive them out.

2.name: Coming to America
2.description: An extremely pampered African Prince travels to Queens, New York, and goes undercover to find a wife that he can respect for her intelligence and will.

3.name: Heathers
3.description: In order to get out of the snobby clique that is destroying her good-girl reputation, an intelligent teen teams up with a dark sociopath in a plot to kill the cool kids.

4.name: Rambo III
4.description: Rambo mounts a one-man mission to rescue his friend Colonel Trautman from the clutches of the formidable invading Soviet forces in Afghanistan.

5.name: Die Hard
5.description: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

6.name: Child's Play
6.description: A single mother gives her son a much sought-after doll for his birthday, only to discover that it is possessed by the soul of a serial killer.

7.name: They Live
7.description: A drifter discovers a pair of sunglasses that allow him to wake up to the fact that aliens have taken over the Earth.

8.name: Running on Empty
8.description: The eldest son of a fugitive family comes of age and wants to live a life of his own.

9.name: Rain Man
9.description: Selfish yuppie Charlie Babbitt's father left a fortune to his savant brother Raymond and a pittance to Charlie; they travel cross-country.

10.name: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
10.description: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

11.name: Willow
11.description: A reluctant dwarf must play a critical role in protecting a special baby from an evil queen.

12.name: Elvira: Mistress of the Dark
12.description: Upon arriving in a small town where she has inherited a rundown mansion, a famous horror hostess battles an evil uncle, and townspeople who want her burned at the stake.

13.name: The Blob
13.description: Remake of the 1958 sci-fi horror classic about a deadly blob from another planet which consumes everything in its path. Teenagers attempt without success to warn the townspeople, who refuse to take them seriously.

14.name: Hotaru no haka
14.description: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

15.name: Killer Klowns from Outer Space
15.description: Aliens who look like clowns come from outer space and terrorize a small town.

16.name: The Last Temptation of Christ
16.description: The life of Jesus Christ, his journey through life as he faces the struggles all humans do, and his final temptation on the cross.

17.name: Pumpkinhead
17.description: After a tragic accident, a man conjures up a towering, vengeful demon called Pumpkinhead to destroy a group of unsuspecting teenagers.

18.name: Young Guns
18.description: A group of young gunmen, led by Billy the Kid, become deputies to avenge the murder of the rancher who became their benefactor. But when Billy takes their authority too far, they become the hunted.

19.name: Big
19.description: After wishing to be made big, a teenage boy wakes the next morning to find himself mysteriously in the body of an adult.

20.name: Akira
20.description: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath who can only be stopped by two teenagers and a group of psychics.

21.name: Stand and Deliver
21.description: The story of Jaime Escalante, a high school teacher who successfully inspired his dropout prone students to learn calculus.

22.name: Nuovo Cinema Paradiso
22.description: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

23.name: Tonari no Totoro
23.description: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

24.name: Cocktail
24.description: A talented New York City bartender takes a job at a bar in Jamaica and falls in love.

25.name: Dangerous Liaisons
25.description: A scheming widow and her manipulative ex-lover make a bet regarding the corruption of a recently married woman.

26.name: A Fish Called Wanda
26.description: In London, four very different people team up to commit armed robbery, then try to doublecross each other for the loot.

27.name: The Lair of the White Worm
27.description: When an archeologist uncovers a strange skull in foreign land, the residents of a nearby town begin to disappear, leading to further unexplainable occurrences.

28.name: Mystic Pizza
28.description: Three teenage girls come of age while working at a pizza parlor in the Connecticut town of Mystic.

29.name: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels
29.description: Two con men try to settle their rivalry by betting on who can swindle a young American heiress out of fifty thousand dollars first.

30.name: Twins
30.description: A physically perfect but innocent man goes in search of his long-lost twin brother, who is short, a womanizer, and small-time crook.

31.name: Bloodsport
31.description: Follows Frank Dux, an American martial artist serving in the military, who decides to leave the army to compete in a martial arts tournament in Hong Kong where fights to the death can occur.

32.name: Working Girl
32.description: When a secretary's idea is stolen by her boss, she seizes an opportunity to steal it back by pretending she has her boss' job.

33.name: The New Adventures of Pippi Longstocking
33.description: After her father's ship is carried off by a sudden storm, the spunky Pippi Longstocking is stranded with her horse, Alfonso, and monkey, Mr. Nilsson, and takes up residence in the old ...                See full summary »

34.name: Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers
34.description: Ten years after his original massacre, the invalid Michael Myers awakens on Halloween Eve and returns to Haddonfield to kill his seven-year-old niece. Can Dr. Loomis stop him?

35.name: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
35.description: Incompetent police Detective Frank Drebin must foil an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.

36.name: The Accused
36.description: After a young woman suffers a brutal gang rape in a bar one night, a prosecutor assists in bringing the perpetrators to justice, including the ones who encouraged and cheered on the attack.

37.name: Mississippi Burning
37.description: Two F.B.I. Agents, with wildly different styles, arrive in Mississippi to investigate the disappearance of some civil rights activists.

38.name: Frantic
38.description: In a hotel room in Paris, a doctor comes out of the shower and finds that his wife has disappeared. He soon finds himself caught up in a world of intrigue, espionage, gangsters, drugs and murder.

39.name: A Nightmare on Elm Street 4: The Dream Master
39.description: Freddy Krueger returns once again to terrorize the dreams of the remaining Dream Warriors, as well as those of a young woman who may be able to defeat him for good.

40.name: Night of the Demons
40.description: Ten teenagers party at an abandoned funeral parlor on Halloween night. When an evil force awakens, demonic spirits keep them from leaving and turn their gathering into a living Hell.

41.name: Midnight Run
41.description: An accountant is chased by bounty hunters, the F.B.I., and the Mafia after jumping bail.

42.name: Vampire's Kiss
42.description: After an encounter with a neck-biter, a publishing executive thinks that he's turning into a vampire.

43.name: The Unbearable Lightness of Being
43.description: In 1968, a Czech doctor with an active sex life meets a woman who wants monogamy, and then the Soviet invasion further disrupts their lives.

44.name: Waxwork
44.description: A wax museum owner uses his horror exhibits to unleash evil on the world.

45.name: The Land Before Time
45.description: An orphaned brontosaurus teams up with other young dinosaurs in order to reunite with their families in a valley.

46.name: The Dead Pool
46.description: Dirty Harry Callahan must stop a sick secret contest to murder local celebrities, which includes himself as a target.

47.name: The Great Outdoors
47.description: A Chicago man's hope for a peaceful family vacation in the woods is shattered when the annoying in-laws drop in.

48.name: Hellbound: Hellraiser II
48.description: Kirsty is brought to an institution after the death of her family, where the occult-obsessive head resurrects Julia and unleashes the Cenobites once again.

49.name: Friday the 13th Part VII: The New Blood
49.description: Years after Tommy Jarvis chained him underwater at Camp Crystal Lake, the dormant Jason Voorhees is accidentally released from his prison by a telekinetic teenager. Now, only she can stop him.

50.name: Bull Durham
50.description: A fan who has an affair with one minor-league baseball player each season meets an up-and-coming pitcher and the experienced catcher assigned to him.
